page.title: 13MY TYPICAL WEEK-DAY
page.content: At 8 o'clock my mum wakes me up with my cereal. I eat it and get out of bed and get dressed.I go into the bathroom and have a good wash and comb my hair, then I go down stairs and watch " Good Morning Britain".When it is 8.45 we say "Bye!"to mum and dad and then go to school at 8.45.The bell goes at 9 o'clock. We line up and walk up to class. We do some Maths and some English, then at 10.40 we go down to play. We play football and at 11.00 we go up to class. We finish our work and at 12.10 we have lunch and finish about 12.45 and have play until l.30. Then we go up to class and do some work. At 2.40 we have play until 3.00.Then we have story in class. At 3.3Op.m. we go home. I play out then at 8.00. I go in to bed and watch T.V. and go to sleep at 9pm.
